name: Space Cadet (Totally)
description:
Happy Birthday Space!

Controls :  WSAD / ARROWS
SPACE TO SHOOT just hold really
Shift to dash

oh and you can use the left mouse to move and shoot at same time
oh and controls are a bit janky but it was made in a day so  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯


Thanks Jayextee for allowing me to use the music
check the album out!
